languages.text: Первый же варп-перелет с ксеносом-друкари обернулся трагедией. Многочисленные жертвы, выпотрошенные прямо на офицерской палубе, отметили путь потерявшего рассудок Маражая. Необходимо отыскать источник угрозы и нейтрализовать его.

traits.locale_text: Первый же варп-перелет с ксеносом-друкари обернулся трагедией. Многочисленные жертвы, выпотрошенные прямо на офицерской палубе, отметили путь потерявшего рассудок Маражая. Необходимо отыскать источник угрозы и нейтрализовать его.

languages.text: The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.
languages.original_text: Первый же варп-перелет с ксеносом-друкари обернулся трагедией. Многочисленные жертвы, выпотрошенные прямо на офицерской палубе, отметили путь потерявшего рассудок Маражая. Необходимо отыскать источник угрозы и нейтрализовать его.

traits.locale_text: The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai who has completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai who has completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

languages.text: Le tout premier saut Warp avec un Drukhari a donné lieu à une tragédie. Sur le pont des officiers, les nombreuses victimes éventrées jalonnent le chemin emprunté par Marazhai, qui semble avoir complètement perdu l'esprit. La source de la menace doit être localisée et neutralisée.
languages.original_text: The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

traits.locale_text: Le tout premier saut Warp avec un Drukhari a donné lieu à une tragédie. Sur le pont des officiers, les nombreuses victimes éventrées jalonnent le chemin emprunté par Marazhai, qui semble avoir complètement perdu l'esprit. La source de la menace doit être localisée et neutralisée.

languages.text: 玛拉斋登舰之后，第一次亚空间跳跃就发生了悲惨的事故。他似乎彻底发了疯，一路肆意杀害船员，在军官甲板上留下了许多惨遭开膛破肚的受害者。行商浪人必须沿着血迹找到威胁的源头，彻底解决这个问题。
languages.original_text: The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋登舰之后，第一次亚空间跳跃就发生了悲惨的事故。他似乎彻底发了疯，一路肆意杀害船员，在军官甲板上留下了许多惨遭开膛破肚的受害者。行商浪人必须沿着血迹找到威胁的源头，彻底解决这个问题。

languages.text: デュカーリを乗せた最初のワープジャンプが悲劇を招いた。士官デッキに残された無数の内臓を抜かれた犠牲者たちが、完全に正気を失ったと思われるマラズハイの通った道筋を示している。この脅威の原因を突き止め、排除しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリを乗せた最初のワープジャンプが悲劇を招いた。士官デッキに残された無数の内臓を抜かれた犠牲者たちが、完全に正気を失ったと思われるマラズハイの通った道筋を示している。この脅威の原因を突き止め、排除しなければならない。

languages.text: Der allererste Warpsprung mit einem Drukhari an Bord hat in einer Tragödie geendet. Zahlreiche ausgeweidete Opfer auf dem Offiziersdeck markieren den Pfad, den Marazhai zurückgelegt hat. Er scheint vollkommen den Verstand verloren zu haben. Die Quelle dieser Gefahr muss lokalisiert und neutralisiert werden.
languages.original_text: The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

traits.locale_text: Der allererste Warpsprung mit einem Drukhari an Bord hat in einer Tragödie geendet. Zahlreiche ausgeweidete Opfer auf dem Offiziersdeck markieren den Pfad, den Marazhai zurückgelegt hat. Er scheint vollkommen den Verstand verloren zu haben. Die Quelle dieser Gefahr muss lokalisiert und neutralisiert werden.

languages.text: El primer salto de disformidad con un Drukhari a bordo ha terminado en desgracia. Hay numerosas víctimas evisceradas en la cubierta de oficiales, marcando el paso de Marazhai, que parece haber enloquecido por completo. Es necesario localizar y neutralizar la fuente de esta amenaza.
languages.original_text: The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.

traits.locale_text: El primer salto de disformidad con un Drukhari a bordo ha terminado en desgracia. Hay numerosas víctimas evisceradas en la cubierta de oficiales, marcando el paso de Marazhai, que parece haber enloquecido por completo. Es necesario localizar y neutralizar la fuente de esta amenaza.

languages.text: Gemide bir Drukhari varken gerçekleştirilen ilk öte sıçrama, felaketle sonuçlandı. Subay güvertesinde sayısız karnı deşilmiş kurban, aklını kaybeden Marazhai'ın geçtiği yolları belli ediyor. Bu tehlikenin kaynağı bulunup ortadan kaldırılmalı.
languages.original_text: The very first warp jump with a Drukhari on board has resulted in tragedy. Numerous disembowelled victims left on the officers' deck mark the path walked by Marazhai, who seems to have completely lost his mind. The source of this threat needs to be located and neutralised.
